ygData.subject: Re: Targetting Mobs
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have mine remapped to the / key on the keypad (right next to autorun). True, there s times that I accidently end up overrunning the mob instead of
ygData.messageBody:
> >Try remaping the attack key to something even more usuless, like the `/~ key
> >or the + key on the VERY FAR right of the keyboard. I have found if I
> >mistype I usually hit the key too far inside rather then outside, and have
> >fewer deaths for poor typing.
>
> Heh - I remapped it to 'x' - it's close and convenient, without there being
> a chance of me typing it before I realize I mistyped. Think about it -
> unless you're talking about OOC stuff (which you shouldn't be to an NPC),
> there's no possible way to hit 'x' before I hit 'space' which is jump.

I have mine remapped to the '/' key on the keypad (right next to autorun).
True, there's times that I accidently end up overrunning the mob instead
of hitting it, but I have _never_ hit it accidently in a social encounter
either.

Now, having Lament and Carillon mixed up (and in the slot for the
other) is something I have done...which ended up being a very painful
lesson in doublechecking and triplechecking songs whenever I'm near an
NPC. ;)

> Makes more sense now that I rationalize it, since it was a rather arbitrary
> decision to begin with *grins*
>
> Talies the rationalizer

Since when have you been rational, Talies? And is there a cure for it?
*grins*

Grei

--

You RAZED the bridge? I said "RAISE the bridge!" Bloody Vikings
